des:
Brought to you by The American Red Cross, Pedro the Penguin’s fire safety challenge is an interactive game that helps you get prepared for a home fire and learn to be fire safe.
Each game is a set of 5 randomized activities, including a mixture of home fire safety activities, coping activities (because home fires can be stressful) and good old fashioned penguin fun. Each time you play, you will get a different set of challenges, making for never-ending excitement!
The game is designed for 4-8 year olds and is suited to individual or group play - all you need is your Alexa and your imagination! Give yourself plenty of room to complete the activities, swimming like a penguin and practicing your smoke crawl takes plenty of space, after all! 
Each time you complete the challenge, you'll earn a fire safety badge in your Alexa app. With 20 badges to collect, keep playing to collect them all!
To locate the badges, open your Alexa app, navigate to the More menu on the right side of the menu bar and select Activity. There you will find your badge! 
To get started, simply say “Hey Alexa, open Pedro’s Fire Challenge!”
